command.description: Revoke all active sessions for the user.
Enable MFA for the user (template, adjust factorType/provider).
command.command:
# Example: enroll an MFA factor for the user via Okta API
curl -X POST https://example.okta.com/api/v1/users/{userId}/factors -H 'Authorization: SSWS <REDACTED_TOKEN>' -H 'Accept: application/json' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{{"factorType": "token:software:totp", "provider": "OKTA"}}'
